languages.text: "Паскаль, не знаю, что за разногласия у тебя с соратниками-Механикус, но будь уверен — мы с Глейто разберемся с любым, кто поднимет на тебя мехадендрит".
languages.translation_comment: After Tarzus attempted to arrest Pasqal.

traits.locale_text: "Паскаль, не знаю, что за разногласия у тебя с соратниками-Механикус, но будь уверен — мы с Глейто разберемся с любым, кто поднимет на тебя мехадендрит".

languages.text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."
languages.translation_comment: After Tarzus attempted to arrest Pasqal.
languages.original_text: "Паскаль, не знаю, что за разногласия у тебя с соратниками-Механикус, но будь уверен — мы с Глейто разберемся с любым, кто поднимет на тебя мехадендрит".

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

"Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

languages.text: 「パスカル、お前が技術司祭の仲間とどんな揉め事を起こしたのかは知らないが、一つだけはっきりしていることがある。グライトと俺は、お前に機械触手を向けるような奴がいれば、必ず始末する」
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: 「パスカル、お前が技術司祭の仲間とどんな揉め事を起こしたのかは知らないが、一つだけはっきりしていることがある。グライトと俺は、お前に機械触手を向けるような奴がいれば、必ず始末する」

languages.text: "Pasqal, ich weiß nicht, welche Meinungsverschiedenheit Ihr mit Euren Techpriester-Kameraden hattet, aber einer Sache könnt Ihr gewiss sein: Glaito und ich kümmern uns um jeden, der auch nur einen Mechadendriten gegen Euch erhebt."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: "Pasqal, ich weiß nicht, welche Meinungsverschiedenheit Ihr mit Euren Techpriester-Kameraden hattet, aber einer Sache könnt Ihr gewiss sein: Glaito und ich kümmern uns um jeden, der auch nur einen Mechadendriten gegen Euch erhebt."

languages.text: « Pasqal, je ne connais pas la nature du désaccord qui vous oppose à vos camarades technoprêtres, mais je peux vous assurer d'une chose : si quelqu'un ose lever la mécadendrite contre vous, Glaito et moi nous occuperons de son cas. »
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: « Pasqal, je ne connais pas la nature du désaccord qui vous oppose à vos camarades technoprêtres, mais je peux vous assurer d'une chose : si quelqu'un ose lever la mécadendrite contre vous, Glaito et moi nous occuperons de son cas. »

languages.text: «Pasqal, ignoro qué clase de desacuerdo habrá tenido con sus camaradas tecnosacerdotes, pero puede estar seguro de una cosa: Glaito y yo nos ocuparemos de cualquiera que levante una sola mecadendrita contra usted».
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: «Pasqal, ignoro qué clase de desacuerdo habrá tenido con sus camaradas tecnosacerdotes, pero puede estar seguro de una cosa: Glaito y yo nos ocuparemos de cualquiera que levante una sola mecadendrita contra usted».

languages.text: “帕斯卡，虽然我不清楚你和你的技术神甫同志之间产生了什么分歧，但我可以向你保证，无论是谁胆敢举起机械触须威胁你，我和格雷托都会把他们处理掉。”
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: “帕斯卡，虽然我不清楚你和你的技术神甫同志之间产生了什么分歧，但我可以向你保证，无论是谁胆敢举起机械触须威胁你，我和格雷托都会把他们处理掉。”

languages.text: "Tekno Rahip yoldaşlarla aranızda ne geçtiğini bilmiyorum Pasqal ama söz, her kim tek bir mekadentriti bile sana kaldırdıysa Glaito ile ensesinde olacağız."
languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."

traits.locale_text: "Tekno Rahip yoldaşlarla aranızda ne geçti, bilmiyorum Pasqal ama söz, her kim tek bir mekadentriti bile sana karşı kışkırtırsa Glaito ile ensesinde olacağız."

languages.original_text: "Pasqal, I don't know what sort of disagreement you've had with your Tech-Priest comrades, but you can be sure of one thing: Glaito and I will deal with anyone who raises a mechadendrite against you."
